formalpara.title: Internal help for this AGI command in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: SET AUTOHANGUP <time> Cause the channel to automatically hangup at <time> seconds in the future. Of course it can be hungup before then as well. Setting to 0 will cause the autohangup feature to be disabled on this channel.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -2,3 +2,4 @@ Cause the channel to automatically hangup at <time> seconds in the future. Of course it can be hungup before then as well. Setting to 0 will cause the autohangup feature to be disabled on this channel. + Runs Dead : No
